    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set​(GLMapView view)
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable2.ViewState
        Copies the state of the specified GLMapView. This method is invoked to set up the targetState in GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.draw(GLMapView).

        Subclasses should capture any implementation specific information from the GLAsynchronousMapRenderable that needs to get passed to the query method during the invocation of this method.

        This method is always invoked on the GL context thread while externally locked on GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.this.

        Overrides:
        set in class GLAbstractDataStoreRasterLayer3.State
        Parameters:
        view - The view
